citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:22 pm on16 Nov
2022. Left voice mail with no response from licensee, no one present at facility at time. Waited 30 minutes.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

2022.  Left voice mail with no response from licensee, no one present at facility at time.  Waited 30 minutes. 
 
 
 
End Section
